#### Authorizations

[â€‹](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/help-center/add-a-new-category#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

To define parent category, e.g product documentation has multiple level features in sales category or in engineering category.
